title: Validation of ten federated learning strategies for multi-contrast image-to-image MRI data synthesis from heterogeneous sources
details: J Fiszer, D Ciupek, M Malawski, T Pieciak - bioRxiv, 2025
abstract: Deep learning (DL)-based image synthesis has recently gained enormous interest in medical imaging, allowing for generating multi-contrast data and therefore, the recovery of missing samples from interrupted or artefact-distorted acquisitions …
